voice.text: Ah, salut! Come 'ere and 'ave some of my delicious fruits!

parameter.value: Ah, 'ello, |PLAYERNAME|! I can see you're longing for my delicious {fruits}, ch?ri.
Bon app?tit, and come back soon for your daily dose of vitamins!
What's your favorite flavour today? I offer all sorts of exotic fruits as well as juice squeezers to create tasty fruit juice. Just ask for a {trade}!
Alors, guess what my job might be, standing 'ere in the middle of all these juicy exotic {fruits}?
